extendedInfo.description: A collection of home screen widgets for Planetside 2.Currently available widgets include: -  Server status - easily see which server is hot and where the battles are! -  Character Stats widget - see a up to date overview of your character, including Battle Rank, Score per minute, K/D ratio, and available certs.Please send through your suggestions for other widgets you would like to see.NOTE: The stats widget is currently displaying the wrong values for Certs. Unfortunately the SOE data is returning the wrong value. The number that the widget shows is the same as the official Players site, as well as PSU. Also includes DashClock extension.Note: If you are having trouble finding the app icon, it's because there isn't one! This is only a widget at this stage. To add a widget have a read through this: http://support.google.com/android/bin/answer.py?hl=en&answer=1628154keywords: planetside, planetside2, planetside 2, widget,dashclock, dashclock extension, character stats, planetside stats, statistics, battle rank, certs, score per minute

reviews.title: Good widgets
reviews.comment: Gives accurate player stats in a nice clean widget which is really the only thing that I use it for. Another widget with more detailed player stats is the only thing I could ask for.
reviews.author: Christopher Truong

reviews.title: Looks good but info light
reviews.comment: These look great but the player stats one doesn\'t show a lot of info.
reviews.author: Darren Ward

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great app that allows me to check my stats vs my mates stats and easily see who\'s on top with multiple side by side widgets but im on battle rank 29 and when I refresh the widget for latest status it say battle rank 27, kd and certs not updated either i\'ve been on battle rank 29 for 2 days but still says 27  I do have good Internet access on s3 and pc and the app version is v1.13 (update Planetside Stat Tracker shows identical scores as this app so across 2 apps now any ideas ? JB 4.1.2 JZ054K.19300XXELLA )
reviews.author: Matt Trudgeon

reviews.title: Very nice!
reviews.comment: It warms my heart to look at my stats when im at work sometimes...

reviews.title: Planetside 2...
reviews.comment: This app is a quite awesome little widget which seems to work well
reviews.author: Adam Widdowson

reviews.title: gg
reviews.comment: awesome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App wont load
reviews.comment: The app installed just fine. But it stuck in the loading screen forever.
reviews.author: Alvian Tjhai

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Perfect for checking stats quickly and easily. This widget makes it simple to keep track of PlanetSide 2.
reviews.author: Brandon Hanson

reviews.comment: Out dated stats
reviews.author: Jake Rawson

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great app, does what it says and does it well.  No complaints here.
reviews.author: Michael Dilkey

reviews.title: Cool widget
reviews.comment: This is a perfect addition to my home screen. Giving a little of ps2 to my phone. The only downside I can see is that on smaller screens the numbers for certs and kd are cut off. I would like an option to increase the size of the widget one bar down so I can views this too. I say well done to the programmer for making an easy to use widget that all android ps2 players can enjoy!
reviews.author: Clay Bilton

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Well made, smooth, and easy. A must for people like me who forget to check stats when I exit the game.and it\'s easier than the players website.
reviews.author: Michael Spencer

reviews.title: Wow, amazing widget
reviews.comment: This widget is great on my htc one x. Style is nice and clean and very much \"planetside\" props to the author
reviews.author: Valentin Hinov

reviews.title: Works great. Looks terrific.
reviews.comment: Love the Planetside look. Great job on these widgets.
reviews.author: Vance Hone

reviews.title: Great widget
reviews.comment: Although on smaller screens the text can be cut off the bottom of the widget. You should create a map widget with live hex coverage on different continents
reviews.author: Matthew Harrison

reviews.title: Battle rank still not showing correct value.
reviews.comment: Downloaded latest update. Checked my character on planetside and I\'m br 37 yet widget shows br 36. Oh well will have to wait for official planetside app.
reviews.author: Philip Harris

reviews.title: OK.
reviews.comment: The 4x2 widget has a place for ktd, cert, and other but only displays my rank. Oh well.
reviews.author: Lance Davis

reviews.title: Nice job
reviews.comment: Very handy. Like it a lot!
reviews.author: erskine patton

reviews.title: A nice Planetside 2 app. Well done.
reviews.comment: [UPDATE] Seems this app depends upon the \'search\' button within Androids on screen keyboard to do the player look-up. If your using a Bluetooth keyboard with your droid you might want to turn it off until the developer fixes this.  I enter my name, hit enter and it does nothing. Nothing to indicate it is searching is displayed. Using a Samsung Google Nexus 10 running Android 4.2.2 version.
reviews.author: Anthony Goodley

reviews.title: Lock screen widget
reviews.comment: How do I get the lock screen widget I\'m on an s3
reviews.author: Aaron smet
